name: ALPHA LEAGUE RACING
description:
Alpha League Racing
is a play to earn NFT racing game
built on SOLANA

Admire one of our top racer nailing the chrono

NFT RACING GAME

Alpha League Racing (ALR) is the first play to earn racing game built on SOLANA. 

NFT Racing game means that you need to buy a 3D ALR NFT car in order to play the full featured game.

A playable demo accessible without any NFT is available on itch.io

In the current state, ALR is a scoring game (inspired by games like Trackmania). It's all about optimizing each turn to get the perfect trajectory in order to save some precious milliseconds. 

WEBGL PRE-ALPHA VERSION

The Alpha League Racing project has started in September 2021.

Our team has moved fast using the agile methodologies in order to deliver a fun driving experience as fast as possible.

Here we are. 

The game is here, and you can drive directly in your browser, no downloads required. 

We are launching new maps and organize contests with prizes every week.

PLAY 2 EARN

NFT Gaming with Play 2 Earn (P2E) is the future of gaming, all the big actors are moving in this direction. 2022 will be an important year for NFT P2E Gaming.

Alpha League Racing is very early on NFT P2E Gaming. 

Read our lite paper and roadmap for more infos.

Our team and community is super active, we organize multiple challenges and events each weeks, with opportunity to win some cars or to earn some money (we are giving away some SOLs to the best drivers!).

BUILT ON SOLANA

Solana is currently the best blockchain for game developers, it is lightning fast and the transactions are super cheap compares to others blockchains.

Behind SOLANA is a foundation with an admirable philosophie.

SOL is the token used by the blockchain SOLANA.
The value has increased significantly during the last months. 

SOLANA is full of very useful and powerful tools for devs.
The community is welcoming and supportive.

Discover SOLANA: solana.com
Follow SOL charts: crypto.com/price/solana 

Alpha League Racing is fast paced & arcade.
Try the demo version on itch.io, without having to buy a NFT

Visite our website for more infos

alphaleagueracing.com NEW TO NFT?
GET YOUR FIRST 3D RACING CAR IN 2 MINUTES 1 Install the chrome extension Phantom.app, and set it up in a few seconds. You can buy SOL with your credit card. Install wallet 2 Mint your first car. Pay 0.25 SOL and get a random car from the ALR generation 1 3D NFT collection. Receive the 3D model in your wallet. Mint a car 3 Connect to the garage, load your 3D NFT and start driving directly in your browser. Join the weekly contests & events and challenge the community. Drive it

Join our community on Twitter and  Discord
